references.reason: This paper provides foundational mathematical background on matrix theory, crucial for understanding the G-Bispectrum's properties.

references.paper_title: Some history of higher-order statistics and spectra
references.reason: This paper provides historical context and foundational knowledge on higher-order statistics and spectra, which are fundamental to understanding the G-Bispectrum.
This paper introduces Group Equivariant Convolutional Networks (G-CNNs), a crucial architecture for applying the G-Bispectrum in deep learning.
This PhD thesis lays the groundwork for the theoretical understanding of the G-Triple Correlation (G-TC), which forms the basis for the G-Bispectrum.
This paper establishes key theoretical properties of the G-Bispectrum on finite groups, directly relevant to the paper's core contributions.
